name: Fintech to YNAB
description: Automatically push Monzo and Starling transactions into YNAB

YNAB_BUDGET_ID.description: Optional: Default budget ID. If not provided, we will use the first budget.

YNAB_MONZO_ACCOUNT_ID.description: Optional: Monzo account ID. If not provided, we will use the first YNAB account.

YNAB_STARLING_ACCOUNT_ID.description: Optional: Starling account ID. If not provided, we will use the first YNAB account.

SKIP_EMOJI.description: Optional: This will tell Fintech to YNAB not to add the emoji to the descriptions. (Monzo Only)

SKIP_FOREIGN_CURRENCY_FLAG.description: Optional: This will tell Fintech to YNAB not to add flags to foreign currency transactions.

SKIP_TAGS.description: Optional: This will tell Fintech to YNAB not to add hashtags to the transaction description. (Monzo Only)

PUSHBULLET_API_KEY.description: Optional: Push category balance notifications to Pushbullet

URL_SECRET.description: Optional: This is a secret used for the webhooks endpoint.
